title: Group Anagrams Together
statement: Given N strings, group anagrams together. Two strings are anagrams if they contain the same characters with the same frequencies. Print each group on a separate line with strings sorted alphabetically within the group.
input_format:
First line contains N.
Next N lines each contain a string.
output_format: Print each group of anagrams on a separate line, with strings in each group sorted alphabetically and space-separated. Groups should be printed in lexicographical order of their first element.
constraints:
1 <= N <= 10^4
1 <= |S| <= 100
Strings contain only lowercase English letters.
